missionProperties.missionName: The Realm of the Dark Side
missionProperties.repositionOverride: Block access to the terminals and the doors.

events.eventText:
You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

The cell into which the Imperials dragged you is tiny and cramped.

{-} Deploy the heroes to the blue highlighted space.

eventActions.theText:
{-} Doors are locked.
{-} A hero can interact with a terminal to claim it. After he does, that hero may test {I} or {J}. If he does not succeed, {D} is increased.
{-} When the heroes have claimed both terminals, the door to the Temple unlocks.
{-} The mission will progress when the door to the Temple opens.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

eventActions.tbText:
As you pace in your cell, a panel in the wall suddenly opens and your gear and weapons are pushed through. Through your comlink you hear the voice of Ahsoka Tano: “The door to your cell is about to open. But be careful, there are still guards around. May the Force be with you.”

Moments after the transmission ends, the door hisses open before you.
"The doors are secured, but there should be consoles somewhere to deactivate the door locks", comes Ahsoka's voice over comlink. "Look for them. I'll meet you later."

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
One of the security consoles controlling the door code.

{-} A hero can interact with the terminal to claim it.

One of the security consoles controlling the door code.

{-} A hero can interact with the terminal to claim it.

eventActions.tbText:
{-} Doors are locked.
{-} A hero can interact with a terminal to claim it. After he does, that hero may test {I} or {J}. If he does not succeed, {D} is increased.
{-} When the heroes have claimed both terminals, the door to the Temple unlocks.
As Ahsoka told you, guards are waiting right behind the door.

events.eventText:
“And we're off!” shouts Ahsoka as you blast away from Coruscant, leaving the enraged Emperor and his apprentice, Vader, behind. As you enter hyperspace, breathing a sigh of relief.

Back at Alliance headquarters, a celebration is held in your honor. Ahsoka and other Rebellion leaders meet to examine the Bardottan sphere shard and decide its fate. In the end, it is determined to be too dangerous to use, but Ahsoka convinces the others not to
destroy it.

A task force is assembled, and the artifact is taken to a remote corner of the galaxy - even you do not know its final hiding place. There is still a long war ahead, but you rest well knowing you have ensured the shard cannot be used for evil, and in doing so have struck a strong blow for the Rebellion.

{-} The Rebels win the campaign!

The victorious Emperor cackles a mirthless laugh as his apprentice, Vader, towers above your prone, defeated form. “You sorry, foolish rebels,” he sneers, holding the last remnant of the Bardottan sphere in his hand. “You have been useful pawns in my designs, and I must thank you for making my acquisition of this powerful artifact possible.” Out the window, you can see Ahsoka’s shuttle forced to retreat by an squadron of TIE fighters, leaving you behind.

“I am afraid, however, that you must still pay for your crimes,” the Emperor says as the troopers close in on you and bind your hands. “Take them away," the Emperor croaks to his troops. “We will show them the consequences for treason and sedition.” As they drag you away toward a waiting prison barge, you can see Palpatine already examining the shard and basking in its power.

{-} The Rebels lose the campaign.
You manage to hack into the console and deactivate it. Suddenly, you realize that you set off some security protocols.

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
One of the security consoles controlling the door code.

{-} A hero can interact with the terminal to claim it.

eventActions.mainText: Test {I} or {J}. Enter the number of successes below.
eventActions.failText: You manage to stop the security protocol before it can set off an alarm.

inputList.theText: You deactivate the security protocols, but not before setting off some kind of alarm.

events.eventText: You manage to hack into the console and deactivate it. Suddenly, you realize that you set off some security protocols.

events.eventText:
As the second console powers down, you can hear the heavy lock on the door to the temple sliding open.

{-} The door to the Temple is now unlocked.

translatedEntityProperties.theText: A sturdy door leads into the old Jedi Temple.

eventActions.theText:
{-} The doors to the Office are locked.
{-} The mission will progress when the door to the Temple opens.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

events.eventText: “Well done,” Ahsoka says over the comilink, “but now the hard part begins.”

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
A sturdy door leads into the old Jedi Temple. It is locked tight.

{-} When the heroes have claimed both terminals, the door to the Temple unlocks.

eventActions.tbText: The former Jedi leaps into view in the streets as guards file into position.
{-} Heroes control <color="red">Ahsoka Tano</color> (Rebel Instigator) as an ally.
“Get to the officers," calls Ahsoka. "They'll have the codes needed to reach the Emperor and finish this!”

{-} When all Imperial Officers are defeated, the doors to the Office unlock.
{-} The mission will progress when a door to the Office opens.

eventActions.theText:
{-} Doors are locked.
{-} When all Imperial Officers are defeated, the doors to the Office unlock.
{-} The mission will progress when a door to the Office opens.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

events.eventText:
You pick up the last officer's code cylinder. The way into the old office - and to the shard of the Bardottan Sphere - is free.

{-} The doors to the Office are now unlocked.

translatedEntityProperties.theText: A door appears to lead into an ancient office.
A door appears to lead into an ancient office. It is locked tight.
A door appears to lead into an ancient office. It is locked tight.
A door appears to lead into an ancient office. It is locked tight.
A door appears to lead into an ancient office. It is locked tight.
A door appears to lead into an ancient office. It is locked tight.

events.eventText: As the door opens, a sense of dread fills you with fear.

eventActions.tbText: In the ancient office stands Emperor Palpatine, eyes alight with malicious fury. “The shards power is mine!” he shouts. “ALL MINE!”

eventActions.customText:
{-} EMPEROR: The other Imperial figure with the highest figure cost that can attack attacks {rebel}.
{A} If this figure is at least 5 spaces away from the shard, it moves 3 toward the shard.
{A} FORCE LIGHTNING: One Rebel within 4 spaces suffers 2 {H} and becomes <color="red">Weakened</color>. If there is another Rebel within 2 spaces of the target, repeat this instruction targeting that Rebel. Limit once per Rebel.
{Q} Move 2 to attack {rebel}.
{A} Move 3 toward the shard.

eventActions.tbText:
{-} <color="red">Emperor Palpatine</color> cannot be defeated.
{-} If <color="red">Emperor Palpatine</color> has suffered 5 or more {H}, he recovers 5 {H} and a strain token is placed on him.
{-} If there are 6 or more strain tokens on <color="red">Emperor Palpatine</color>, his activation is limited.
You have only just recovered from the shock of Palpatine's presence when you hear the terrifying noise of a mechanical breathing apparatus behind you.
Your hands tremble as you grab your weapons. There it is, right next to Palpatine. The shard of the Bardottan Sphere is glowing softly in the dim twilight of the old Jedi Temple.

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
The shard of the Bardottan sphere is glowing softly.

{-} A hero can interact with the shard to try and retrieve it ({K} or {J}).

eventActions.tbText:
{-} The neutral mission token represents the shard. A hero can interact with the shard to try and retrieve it ({K} or {J}).
{-} If <color="red">Emperor Palpatine</color> is within 4 spaces of the shard, apply -X {B} to the results where X is 4 minus the number of strain tokens on <color="red">Emperor Palpatine</color>, to a minimum of 0. While performing this test, that hero may suffer 1 {C} to reroll up to 2 dice.
{-} If a hero drops the shard, a hero can later retrieve it (without the need to test).
{-} When all heroes are adjacent to the overpass, if a hero is carrying the shard, the heroes are extracted.
{-} The Rebels win when the heroes are extracted.

eventActions.theText:
{-} <color="red">Emperor Palpatine</color> cannot be defeated.
{-} If <color="red">Emperor Palpatine</color> has suffered 5 or more {H}, he recovers 5 {H} and a strain token is placed on him.
{-} If there are 6 or more strain tokens on <color="red">Emperor Palpatine</color>, his activation is limited.
{-} The neutral mission token represents the shard. A hero can interact with the shard to try and retrieve it ({K} or {J}).
{-} If <color="red">Emperor Palpatine</color> is within 4 spaces of the shard, apply -X {B} to the results where X is 4 minus the number of strain tokens on <color="red">Emperor Palpatine</color>, to a minimum of 0. While performing this test, that hero may suffer 1 {C} to reroll up to 2 dice.
{-} If a hero drops the shard, a hero can later retrieve it (without the need to test).
{-} When all heroes are adjacent to the overpass, if a hero is carrying the shard, the heroes are extracted.
{-} The Rebels win when the heroes are extracted.
{-} {-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

eventActions.tbText:
Ahsoka appears to be just as struck with fear as you, but she takes a deep breath and turns to the towering figure of Darth Vader. "Get the shard," she says over her shoulder. "I'll bring my shuttle around to pick you up!"

She rushes toward Vader, who raises his red lightsaber in anticipation, but Ahsoka is not looking for direct combat. She feints to the side, exchanges some quick lightsaber glances with the Sith, then leaps over him and vanishes towards the street and her shuttle.

{-} Withdraw <color="red">Ahsoka Tano</color>.

eventActions.mainText:
Trying to fight the malice pushing you away, you reach for the shard.

{-} Test {K} or {J}. Apply +1 {B} for each strain token on the shard, then discard all strain tokens on the shard.
{-} If <color="red">Emperor Palpatine</color> is within 4 spaces of the shard, apply -X {B} to the results where X is 4 minus the number of strain tokens on <color="red">Emperor Palpatine</color>, to a minimum of 0. While performing this test, you may suffer 1 {C} to reroll up to 2 dice.
{-} Enter the number of successes below.

inputList.theText:
You scream in anguish as you try to force your hand closed around the shard, but fail. You need to keep trying.

{-} Place 1 strain token on the shard for each {B} result gained.
You scream in pain, but manage to grab the shard in your hand.

eventActions.mainText:
<color="red">Emperor Palpatine</color> activates.

How many strain tokens are on <color="red">Emperor Palpatine</color>?
eventActions.failText:
The Emperor is unfazed from your attempts to stop him.

{-} <color="red">Emperor Palpatine</color> activates as normal.

inputList.theText:
The Emperor staggers back and croaks in fury, surprised by your ferocity.

<color="red">Emperor Palpatine</color> immediately resolves the following instructions:

{A}{A} Remove 1 strain token from <color="red">Emperor Palpatine</color>.
{-} Ignore all bonus effects except for TEMPT and DARK RAGE. Ignore all further instructions from his instruction window and end the activation.

events.eventText: Carrying the shard is like carrying hot lead with your bare hands, but you wrest it away from the Emperor. Palpatine roars with anger, but this is drowned out by the engine sounds of Ahsoka's shuttle arriving. "Get over here!", Ahsoka shouts.

eventActions.theText:
{-} <color="red">Emperor Palpatine</color> cannot be defeated.
{-} If <color="red">Emperor Palpatine</color> has suffered 5 or more {H}, he recovers 5 {H} and a strain token is placed on him.
{-} If there are 6 or more strain tokens on <color="red">Emperor Palpatine</color>, his activation is limited.
{-} If a hero drops the shard, a hero can later retrieve it (without the need to test).
{-} When all heroes are adjacent to the overpass, if a hero is carrying the shard, the heroes are extracted. Click the overpass highlight and select "Extract".
{-} The Rebels win when the heroes are extracted.
{-} {-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
Ahsoka Tano's shuttle is hovering just below the overpass, ready to launch as soon as you get in.

{-} When all heroes are adjacent to the overpass, if a hero is carrying the shard, click "Extract" to end the mission.

eventActions.tbText: {-} When all heroes are adjacent to the overpass, if a hero is carrying the shard, the heroes are extracted. Click the overpass highlight and select "Extract".
